text: Nice mechanics and shop. Prices are reasonable and the mechs at this shop are not pushy nor sales focus type. Paynow is available for convinence. Has been going there for the past 1 year and has changed tyres set, brake pads, battery, monthly basic oil change/servicing. This shop has been around for very long time judging from the signboard and hopefully longer.
Good attitude and meticulous mechanic, parts that don't need to change they will not change for you. 10 years of being their loyal customer

Excellent service by professional people. Buying motorcycle is an easy process with Hua Ho trading . Bought second hand motorcycle from them. Finished procedure within an hour. Thanks to my friend for recommending this shop.

Called them and was ask to bring the bike down for a check instead of asking it through phone call, boss and mechanics were professional in diagnostic the problem. Workshop was pack and I understand why the boss insist on bringing the bike down instead of answering call. P.S They also do Motorbike COE renewal

Attitude too bad!!

My vehicle coolant reservoir is leaking and just inquiry ex-stock (phone call)?
The boss answer is: don't talk too many, waste time and telling me direct ride my motorcycle go there!! After that he direct off the phone!!
